name: pulse
value: @keyframes pulse { 0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); } 50% { transform: scale(1.15); } } animation: pulse 1s ease-in-out 0s infinite;

name: rotate
value: @keyframes rotate { from { transform: rotate(0deg); } to { transform: rotate(360deg); } } animation: rotate 0.5s ease-in-out 0s infinite;

name: spin
value: @keyframes spin { from { transform: rotate(0deg); } to { transform: rotate(360deg); } } animation: spin 1s linear 0s infinite;

name: bounce
value: @keyframes bounce { 0%, 20%, 53%, 80%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); } 40%, 43% { transform: translateY(-15px); } 70% { transform: translateY(-7px); } 90% { transform: translateY(-3px); } } animation: bounce 1s ease-in-out 0s infinite;

name: shake
value: @keyframes shake { 0%, 100% { transform: translateX(0); } 10%, 30%, 50%, 70%, 90% { transform: translateX(-10px); } 20%, 40%, 60%, 80% { transform: translateX(10px); } } animation: shake 0.5s ease-in-out 0s infinite;

name: wobble
value: @keyframes wobble { 0% { transform: translateX(0%) rotate(0deg); } 15% { transform: translateX(-25%) rotate(-5deg); } 30% { transform: translateX(20%) rotate(3deg); } 45% { transform: translateX(-15%) rotate(-3deg); } 60% { transform: translateX(10%) rotate(2deg); } 75% { transform: translateX(-5%) rotate(-1deg); } 100% { transform: translateX(0%) rotate(0deg); } } animation: wobble 1s ease-in-out 0s infinite;

name: jello
value: @keyframes jello { 0%, 11.1%, 100% { transform: skewX(0deg) skewY(0deg); } 22.2% { transform: skewX(-12.5deg) skewY(-12.5deg); } 33.3% { transform: skewX(6.25deg) skewY(6.25deg); } 44.4% { transform: skewX(-3.125deg) skewY(-3.125deg); } 55.5% { transform: skewX(1.5625deg) skewY(1.5625deg); } 66.6% { transform: skewX(-0.78125deg) skewY(-0.78125deg); } 77.7% { transform: skewX(0.390625deg) skewY(0.390625deg); } 88.8% { transform: skewX(-0.1953125deg) skewY(-0.1953125deg); } } animation: jello 1s ease-in-out 0s infinite;

name: flip
value: @keyframes flip { 0% { transform: perspective(400px) rotateY(0); } 40% { transform: perspective(400px) translateZ(150px) rotateY(170deg); } 50% { transform: perspective(400px) translateZ(150px) rotateY(190deg) scale(1); } 80% { transform: perspective(400px) rotateY(360deg) scale(0.95); } 100% { transform: perspective(400px) scale(1); } } animation: flip 1s ease-in-out 0s infinite;

name: flash
value: @keyframes flash { 0%, 50%, 100% { opacity: 1; } 25%, 75% { opacity: 0; } } animation: flash 1s ease-in-out 0s infinite;

name: heartBeat
value: @keyframes heartBeat { 0% { transform: scale(1); } 14% { transform: scale(1.3); } 28% { transform: scale(1); } 42% { transform: scale(1.3); } 70% { transform: scale(1); } } animation: heartBeat 1.3s ease-in-out 0s infinite;

name: rubberBand
value: @keyframes rubberBand { 0% { transform: scale(1); } 30% { transform: scaleX(1.25) scaleY(0.75); } 40% { transform: scaleX(0.75) scaleY(1.25); } 50% { transform: scaleX(1.15) scaleY(0.85); } 65% { transform: scaleX(0.95) scaleY(1.05); } 75% { transform: scaleX(1.05) scaleY(0.95); } 100% { transform: scale(1); } } animation: rubberBand 1s ease-in-out 0s infinite;

name: dots
value: @keyframes dots { 0%, 80%, 100% { transform: scale(0); } 40% { transform: scale(1); } } animation: dots 1.4s ease-in-out 0s infinite both;

name: lineProgress
value: @keyframes dash {to {stroke-dashoffset: 0;}} stroke-dasharray: 20 10; stroke-dashoffset: 30; animation: dash 1s linear 0s infinite;

name: hueRotate
value: @keyframes hueRotate {to {filter: hue-rotate(360deg);}} filter: hue-rotate(0deg); animation: hueRotate 1s linear 0s infinite;

name: zoomFade
value: @keyframes zoomFade {0% {transform: scale(1);opacity: 1;}100% {transform: scale(2);opacity: 0;}} animation: zoomFade 1s ease-in-out 0s infinite;
